segments.text: I'm observing a domestic scene, quite typical on the surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman is diligently drying a plate at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my attention is drawn to the sink itself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running, and the basin is completely full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's actually pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A widening puddle is forming on the floor, right where her foot is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm truly surprised she hasn't noticed her foot is in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely absorbed in a task?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely going to cause some significant water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children might also slip on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the loud splash and cries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bizarre tableau of impending minor disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just continues polishing that plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR
